Download a zip archive with all data in a volume.

Source: R/download_session_zip.R
download_volume_zip.Rd

Download a zip archive with all data in a volume.

download_volume_zip(
  vol_id = 31,
  out_dir = ".",
  file_name = "test.zip",
  vb = FALSE
)

Arguments

vol_id

Volume number.

out_dir

Directory to save output file.

file_name

Name for downloaded file, default is 'test.mp4'.

vb

A Boolean value. If TRUE provides verbose output.

Examples

download_volume_zip()
#> Attempting to download zip archive from volume 31.
#> 
  |
